评论概述: Definitely cheap, but they were in the 90s too!
评论详情: I wore this for a 90s Spirit Day at my school (I’m a middle school teacher). It was a fun throwback to the style of my middle school days! They’re a bit snug for my liking, but that’s what chokers are supposed to feel like. Definitely cheap plastic, just like I remember from all those decades ago. But exactly what I needed for a good price!

This is a little thicker than most elastic chokers I’m so happy about the band’s thickness. I’m a larger woman and needed something to fit my neck size and these were the perfect set, you get one with a charm of your choice and one plain black. The set of two were mature and lovely.
Two were sent, and the one with the charm, that I ordered this for? After 15 minutes of wriggling, it's destined for the trash. Skip this order, buy something else to fulfill your nostalgia hiccups
The yin yang charm was smaller than expected but still nice. Looks good with many outfits.
Choker necklace was as described. Purchased for a 90's party. Very pleased with it.

These used to be made smaller and better the first time they were trending. I don’t care if my age shows by saying so, but it’s true.  One of these chokers almost fit, but it was still loose. The other was even looser with kinks that interrupted the pattern from how these were packaged. They used to flatten these into a circle to package to avoid warpage. The yin-yang charm was cute, but it also didn’t seem entirely to fit - the look, the scale… it just seemed off. I am returning these.
I liked it . Very soft and not to tight

This is meant for someone with a very slender neck. I would say my neck is average in size, and it's snug. I had to stretch it to it's max width just to get it over my head. What's odd is that the extra choker (no charm) fits perfectly, so maybe there's a bit of size variance with these. I'm going to see if I can switch the charm to the one that fits. Also, this is VERY overpriced for what you get. There are packs of 24 chokers of similar style/quality on Amazon for about the same price as this 2-pack. I do not recommend purchasing this.
